vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
πάροιν-ος, ον,
={παροινικός}, Pratin.[Refs 5th c.BC+]; μάχαι π. [Refs];τὸ σὸν π. [Refs 4th c.BC+]. adverb -νως [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II ={παροίνιος}[Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
drunken, given to drunkenness
primarily pertaining to wine, drunken; hence, quarrelsome, insolent, overbearing, 1Tim. 3:3; Tit. 1:7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: borracho, dado a las bebidas fuertes
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 醉酒的, 有酒癮的 (提前 3:3; 多 1:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 醉酒的, 有酒瘾的 (提前 3:3; 多 1:7)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: mê rượu nho; nghiện rượu; cãi vã và hung bạo; say rượu. παρά (G3844) + οἶνος (G3631)
